Grey weevil.pesticides: Apply chlorpyrifos 20 EC @ 2.5 ml/litre of water. Soil drenching near the root zone can be effective against larvae.
Grey weevil.insecticides: Use imidacloprid 17.8 SL @ 0.5 ml/litre or neem oil 2% as foliar spray at early infestation.

Gurdle Beetle.pesticides: Spray triazophos 40 EC @ 2.5 ml/litre or profenofos 50 EC @ 2 ml/litre. Focus on the stem base area.
Gurdle Beetle.insecticides: Use chlorpyrifos 20 EC or lambda-cyhalothrin 5 EC at recommended dosage. Apply twice at 15-day intervals.

Stem Fly.pesticides: Spray dimethoate 30 EC @ 2 ml/litre or thiamethoxam 25 WG @ 0.3 g/litre during early infestation stage.
Stem Fly.insecticides: Use imidacloprid 17.8 SL seed treatment @ 5 ml/kg seed or apply systemic insecticides during vegetative growth.

White Fly.pesticides: Use neem-based formulations (neem oil 3%) or buprofezin 25 SC @ 1 ml/litre. Ensure good leaf coverage.
White Fly.insecticides: Apply thiamethoxam 25 WG @ 0.25 g/litre or acetamiprid 20 SP @ 0.3 g/litre. Avoid repeated use of same chemical to prevent resistance.
